createdieselgenerators.ponder.distillati: Apply a Distillation Controller to a Fluid tank to create a Distillation Tower.
... give the Blaze Burners some heat ...
createdieselgenerators.ponder.pumpjack.t: Pumpjacks allow you to acquire Crude Oil ...
... to start using pumpjacks, attach a Pumpjack Crank ...
... and add a pipe to bedrock.
Pumpjacks can only pump out Oil from Oil Chunks, you can look for them using Oil Detectors
When assembled, it will start producing Oil.
Pumpjack Cranks can be large, or small.
createdieselgenerators.ponder.diesel_eng: Engines are a compact way of generating kinetic energy.
Give it some milk (or other forms of fuel) and it will produce kinetic energy.
createdieselgenerators.ponder.basin_ferm: Setting up a Basin Fermenting Station
Basin Lids allow you to create Ethanol.
Give them some Sugar and Bone Meals...
createdieselgenerators.ponder.large_dies: Modular Diesel Engines function like normal Diesel engines.
Once you give them some fuel, they will produce Kinetic Energy ...
They will generate stress proportionally to how much engines you stack.
createdieselgenerators.ponder.engine_sil: Engine Silencers are used to make Engines Silent.
Once you apply an Engine Silencer, the Engine will stop making any noises.
createdieselgenerators.ponder.huge_diese: ... they will start generating Kinetic Energy, once you give them some fuel.
